description: This file defines a knowledge base about Earth using documents and vector database, then creates an agent to interact with this knowledge base and prompts it with a question.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and responds to queries.

classes.name: Document
classes.description: Represents a document with content to be stored in the knowledge base.

classes.name: DocumentKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base constructed from documents, supporting vector search.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted as markdown.
